thread.title: Best of Luck to Once Upon a Time as It Prepares to Cast Tiger Lily
thread.title_full: Best of Luck to Once Upon a Time as It Prepares to Cast Tiger Lily

author: Katharine Trendacosta
title: Best of Luck to Once Upon a Time as It Prepares to Cast Tiger Lily
text:
Go to permalink Image: Once Upon a Time Season 3, ABC 
I’m so glad Once Upon a Time is returning to Neverland, since that wasn’t a pointless slog of a plot cul-de-sac at all. And they’re now adding a character that has to be handled really carefully so that it doesn’t turn into a nightmare. Good luck, guys! Advertisement 
According to TV Line , Once Upon a Time is looking for a Native American actress for the part, which is an absolute requirement. Tiger Lily is also described as, I kid you not, “a force to be reckoned with” and “the kind of woman who’ll risk her life to save yours — and she’ll do it even quicker if it benefits her.” Just... don’t do this. Don’t give us the dark and gritty take on a plot that we had hoped this show had left behind in season three. Move forward, Once Upon a Time ! Stop going backwards! 
Also, of course , she’s going to have some sort of backstory with Hook. Goddammit, this show is a plague.
